lead_paragraph: A Delaware court affirmed a ruling stemming from a deadlock over the management of the privately held, New York-based business its feuding founders started in a college dorm room.
snippet: A Delaware court affirmed a ruling stemming from a deadlock over the management of the privately held, New York-based business its feuding founders started in a college dorm room....

headline.main: Court-Ordered Sale of TransPerfect Translation Company Is Upheld
headline.print_headline: Forced Sale of Translation Company Is Upheld
